oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Military pass issued to Joseph N. B. Lusk
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Military pass issued by order of Maj. Gen. [Don Carlos] Buell allowing the railroad passage of Joseph N. B. Lusk and three men to Nashville, "free of charge." The pass is adressed to the "Conductor of the R.Rd." The pass is signed by; J. G. Chandler, Captain and Chief Quartersmaster. Lusk deserted the Confederate army and joined the 1st Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA.
